alternative_parents.description: Primary amines where the only hydrocarbyl substituent of the amine group is aromatic. Primary amines have the general formula RNH2 (R=aryl).
alternative_parents.name: Primary aromatic amines

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
alternative_parents.name: Benzenoids

alternative_parents.description: Organoarsenic compounds in which a carbon is linked to a trivalent arsenic atom.
alternative_parents.name: Trivalent organic arsenic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organosulfur compounds a sulfenyl group with the general formula RS (R = organyl).
alternative_parents.name: Sulfenyl compounds

alternative_parents.description: Amines having the nitrogen atom linked to exactly two hydrocarbyl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Secondary amines

alternative_parents.description: Organoarsenic compounds with the general formula R[As]S, where R = organyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Organoarsenic sulfides

alternative_parents.description: Organic salt compounds containing a metalloid atom in its ionic form.
alternative_parents.name: Organic metalloid salts

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an heterocycle with at least one nitrogen atom and one carbon atom linked to each other.
alternative_parents.name: Azacyclic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Heterocyclic compounds contain one metal ring atom.
class.name: Metalloheterocyclic compounds

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as benzarsazines and derivatives. These are polycyclic aromatic compounds containing a benzene ring fused to a 1,4-azarsine ring.

direct_parent.description: Polycyclic aromatic compounds containing a benzene ring fused to a 1,4-azarsine ring.
direct_parent.name: Benzarsazines and derivatives

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Polycyclic aromatic compounds containing a benzene ring fused to a 1,4-azarsine ring.
subclass.name: Benzarsazines and derivatives

superclass.description: Compounds containing a ring with least one carbon atom and one non-carbon atom.
superclass.name: Organoheterocyclic compounds
